story.text: Jan 3 Sontra Medical Corp. SONT.O said its acting chief executive officer, Thomas Davison, resigned as the company entered into an $600,000 equity investment deal with Sherbrooke Partners LLC and certain board and management members. The company said the deal involves the issue of 6 million shares of common stock for 10 cents per share and two-year warrants to purchase 1.5 million shares of common stock at an exercise price of 21 cents a share. Sontra Medical said its acting Chief Financial Officer Harry Mitchell would take over as its interim CEO. (Reporting by Tenzin Pema in Bangalore)
story.title: sontra medical acting ceo resigns after equity investment deal
